intro: Irlbachia elegans, commonly known as the elegant irbachia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its delicate, daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and white petals. Native to southern Africa, this species thrives in well-drained soils and full sun exposure. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm and produces small, seed-filled capsules for reproduction. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardens and botanical collections.
